item.title: Automatic Dependent Surveillance- Broadcast (ADS-B) System – Link and Display Processor Unit (LDPU)

note.para: Cockpit Display Traffic Information (CDTI) display of data from other aircraft systems may be used.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "ADS-B LDPU INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
